name: Body Run (emaluaen)
description:
body fit run it's new beauty run game, it's challenging game make you have fun and look beauty and fabulous even if become your body look fit or fat.

on this beauty run there is no weight limit you can make your body fit or fat! Own the runway and race to the finish line.

Get fit to fat or fat to fit in the race to win! Avoid those various obstacles: various food and fitness gear like burger and broccoli.

in this new beauty run game you can become Fit to fat or Fat to fit deepening on the goal of levels and how you like your body become.

So put on those heels and tackle those pesky and race on the runway to the finish line to make your body fit or fat.
